document_data.name: Wave of Telekinesis
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wave of telekinesis''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Callarduran Smoothhands]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to move one or more objects in a violent action. Targeted objects within {{SI|10|yd|long=yes}} from the caster, weighing up to {{SI|25|lb|k|long=yes}}, were thrown up to {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} away. This distance increased as the caster increased their skill level.
